plot outline: A girl name sakina, braved wire fencing at the international border. And entered India. After being tortured by some Muslim guys there. She took shelter in a Hindu family in India. Trouble broke out surrounding her presence in the village. What happen next in her life? How she survive this crisis. Can the girl return to a peace-full and normal life??
title: Simanto Periye
plot: A girl name sakina, braved wire fencing at the international border. And entered India. After being tortured by some Muslim guys there. She took shelter in a Hindu family in India. Trouble broke out surrounding her presence in the village. What happen next in her life? How she survive this crisis. Can the girl return to a peace-full and normal life??::Somnath Sen
